data.name: Fantasy Grounds - King of Chicago (Call of Cthulhu)
data.detailed_description:
Part One of the King of Chicago bundle


A gangland adventure for 1920's Call of Cthulhu.

Chicago in the Roaring Twenties : crime is rampant, it os a world of violence, intimidation, bribery and treachery. Rival gangs are locked in violent power struggles as each ambitious hood looks to become the King of Chicago. Amidst this war our heroes, the investigators, must face the rum-running gangs of the Windy City to solve a murder.

CALL OF CTHULHU

Horror Roleplaying in the Worlds of H.P. Lovecraft

Development Team: Rich Laiacona, Donna Revell, Stuart Woodard

Written by Gary Sumpter

Covert art by Earl Geier. Map of the Casbah by Sam Shirley.

Released on February 27, 2010. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requirements: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate License and a one time purchase of the Call of Cthulhu ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
